features: 【Smart Watch Compatible with iPhone/Android Phones】- This smart watch is compatible with most iOS 8.0 & Android 4.4 or higher smart phones (Not for PC or tablet). Pairing it to your phone, you can answer/make calls and read messages/app notifications(including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Whatsapp, and more) directly on this smartwatch.

【Accurate Fitness Tracker with 85 Sport Modes】- This fitness tracker watch can accurately track your all day calories burned, steps taken, distance traveled. 85 sports modes including various outdoor and indoor activities, allow you to get the real-time workout data on the watch.

【Heart Rate/Blood Oxygen Monitor & Sleep Tracker】- This health tracker watch will auto monitor your heart rate and sleep quality all day. You can also use it to monitor your real-time blood oxygen saturation. By connecting the smartwatch to your phone, the app will provide you the detailed heart rate chart and comprehensive analysis of your sleep quality to help you stay active and stay healthy.

【Customized Watch Faces & IP68 Waterproof Smart Watch】- This smartwatch adopts 1.83 inch HD touch screen, and there are 100+ watch faces options in the app for you to customize your own style. You can also DIY the watch face with your favorite photo like pets photo or selfie. With IP68 waterproof standard, you can wear this watch with no worries while washing hands or sweating out.

【Smart Watch for Women Men & More Practical Features】- This digital watch can fit well both for for women and men (band size: 6.1-9.6 inch). It has many practical features, such as alarm clocks, music control, stopwatch, timer, deep breath guide, sedentary reminder, female menstrual cycle tracker, etc. It's a very good gift choice for your friends and family members to help them stay motivated.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tips: In order to maintain a comfortable and skin-friendly wearing experience, please do the following. 1. Please clean the watch regularlly, and keep it clean and dry when wearing. 2. Please don't wear the watch too tight or wear it for a long time, so your wrist skin can breath well and feel comfortable.

All-day Heart Rate Monitoring The advanced built-in heart rate sensor will continuously measure your heart rate all day (every 5 mins). You can also manually track your real-time heart rate on your watch or intuitively check the heart rate graph in the app. Fitness Tracker with 80+ Sports Modes The GRV smart watch has 80+ built-in sport modes, so you can get data for all your favorite sports, such as walking, running, cycling, yoga, climbing, treadmill and more. This fitness watch can help you to track daily activity data like steps, distance, calories burned, miles walked. You can also activate the GPS function of your smartphone and track the routes you have travelled during your workout via the app. Make/Answer Calls & Message Notifications Once connected the watch to the app, you can seamlessly answer and make calls from your watch. The smart watch also alerts you to incoming calls, texts, SNS messages from Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and more. Keep you informed in time of anything important.

Sleep Tracker Watch A good sleep is very important to our health. Do you know how well you sleep? Let this watch tell you. It can automatically detect your sleep and analyze your sleep quality, providing you the deep sleep time, light sleep time and wake up time. It can help you know yourself better and live healthier. Blood Oxygen Saturation Monitoring Feeling exhausted? With our smartwatch, you can measure your blood oxygen saturation anytime, to quickly understand your physical state. Long Battery Life This digital watch is designed with large battery capacity and low power consumption. When fully-charged, this smartwatch can work up to 5 days or remain 30 days standby time. It can help you get rid of anxiety about battery.

Set Up to 10 Alarm Clocks This watch can support up to 10 alarm clocks, which can meet your all kinds of reminder demand such as waking you up, bedtime reminder, appointments, meetings and more. More Useful Tools Equipped with weather forecast, SOS emergency call, music playback control, breath training, calculator, adjustable brightness levels and many more functions. The GRV smart watch brings more convenience to your life. Stopwatch & Cutdown Tools If you want to optimize or record your workout duration, these tools would be very practical for you. You can also use it in many other occasions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for an inexpensive watch to track my steps (heart rate/O2 are a bonus), this works great for that! It says it starts counting after 10 steps during 'awake' hours and 20 steps during 'sleeping' hours. I thought I walked way more than I actually did according to this watch. It is pretty accurate as I have counted my steps and checked the watch and they are within a couple steps. It tracks your heart rate and your O2 levels and saves the history in the app. It's nice to have that info at the push of a button instead of writing it all down (and misplacing the sheet of paper). I have mine set up to take my heart rate and O2 levels once an hour so I can see how I'm doing anytime I want. Great information to have for my next annual Dr appointment. It alerts me to get up and move if I haven't done so in 1 hour (vibrates 3 times and shows on the screen to get up and move). It also allowed me to set up an alert if my heart rate goes above a certain number that I have entered. Took me a while to figure out why it vibrated 5 times with nothing on the screen, that's your warning that your heart rate is above that set number you entered. The sleep tracker works fairly good, sometimes it says I have 'rapid eye movement' after I have woke up so that could use a little tweaking but overall, it does a pretty good job tracking your sleep. Tells you when you are in deep sleep, light sleep, rapid eye movement and awake. There are a lot of options to set up through the app, I don't think I'm using it to it's full potential but it works great for what I wanted. It connects to your phone via bluetooth so it rings when your phone rings, you get to see the text on your watch (I haven't figured out how to text back from the watch but I just grab my phone for the bigger screen to text anyways), it shows you emails that you receive, shows notifications from Facebook, Messenger, WhatsApp, etc. You can pick which apps you want notifications for through the app on your phone. I have not worn it in the shower to see if it's water proof, I take all jewelry off anyways, it seems fine when I wash my hands and splash it with a little water, never has it been submerged in water. The watch band is a little irritating if you get water/sweat behind it. Because you need it somewhat tight on your wrist for accurate readings, water/sweat can irritate your skin under the band, no worries, take it off and wipe the water/sweat off the watch, band and your wrist and it's fine. Battery life is actually better than I thought it would be, it gets down to about 25% after about 5-6 days. I charge it while I'm at work, I'm sitting at my desk anyways so I don't have to worry about missed steps or not tracking my sleep. Haven't timed a charge but I'd say it's around 1 - 1 1/2 hours to fully charge it. It does still vibrate if you get a text, call, email or other notification, however, when you tap the side button to wake it up, all you see is the charging status, you cannot see the notification. Overall, I highly recommend this watch if you are looking for a 'smart watch' but without the smart watch price and its own line on your phone plan. I have a Nord phone (same as Samsung only WAY cheaper), Android operating system, and this works just fine with my phone, no issues at all!! Highly, HIGHLY recommend this watch!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this! Great value and works well!!
reviews.reviewText: This is my 2nd one. The 1st one broke from a freak accident involving a car and the driveway… This smart watch is not an Apple Watch by any means; however, it works great for steps, sleep, heart rate, and reminding you to move! It is not a 2 way communication device as it only receives alerts of a text message or call - it does not take pictures or allow you to send messages out and you can’t talk into it… but as a 1 way communication device - it is sleek and easy to switch out the bands to different styles and colors. The display is easy to use and the battery life is AWESOME!! The app for your phone is easy to use and link up with the watch as well. I had to charge it every 3 days. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worked great for 10 months
reviews.reviewText: Look... you know you are buying a cheap smart watch. It really had great features. I was very happy with this watch. It worked well, I liked the connection with my phone. The app is definitely less than desirable, but if you want a watch that will accurately count steps, show texts, track sleep, etc, it was great. It lasted for 10 months. Compared to the price of other smart watches, I still count that as a win. I actually just replaced this with a different cheap smart watch, but I liked this one better, so I think I'll return the other and repurchase this one. Compared to the other one I bought, this one is very easy to use, tracks steps/sleep/exercise more accurately, and you can program what time of night you'd like the screen to automatically dim. My other watch is so bright when I roll over at night that is driving me crazy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this watch but some issues
reviews.reviewText: I really only got this because I wanted my watch to receive phone calls when I am not near my phone and it is not connecting I have to turn everything off then on again it worked yesterday now it's not working at all I was so excited for this thing I just want it to work right

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great watch! But doesn't sync
reviews.reviewText: Truly love this watch - comfortable to wear, easy to set up on the app it has you download (GloryFit), tracks my steps, tracks my sleep, and there's a ton of features - one of my favorites was answering calls and talking directly from my watch. The battery life is great. For my girls that like pink, this watch is it! I give it 5 stars for all of that. BUT this watch does NOT sync with my health apps (I use Samsung health and Google fit). I've had the watch for 2 weeks and unpaired and re-paired, gone thru every single feature and setting on this thing - there's no way to pair it. I bought this watch for the sole purpose of tracking my activity to sync with my health apps. And because it doesn't, I will be returning this.If the syncing part isn't a big thing for you, then I highly recommend this purchase. It's a lot of bang for your buck, and it's a cute watch! Just wear it and go 🚶‍♀️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Have been through 2 diff. Fitbits & this fitness band at a 1/3 of the price performs better. Especially the ❤️ rate monitor. It's spot on & ease to navigate is great. Definitely worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing bang for the buck!
reviews.reviewText: Bright EASY TO READ FACE. multiple practical and useful quality of life features for everyone.SO light, with amazing fit.Can not believe how easy it pairs with phone!JUST St BUY IT!

reviews.reviewerName: Super easy and quick to put together! Easiest drawer slides I’ve ever installed by the way. Love how deep the drawers are and the color of the wood on top. Absolutely love it
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great for the money
reviews.reviewText: This watch is a game changer for those who can’t afford the Apple watches etc. it tracks sleep, steps, heartbeat, exercise, pulse ox, alarms/timers. Only downsides are mine has stopped tracking my sleep and you can’t answer your calls but outside of that it’sWorth it

Die GRV Smartwatch ist eine hochfunktionale Fitnessuhr, die eine Vielzahl von nützlichen Funktionen bietet, um meine Gesundheit und Fitness zu überwachen und zu verbessern.Zu den bemerkenswerten Eigenschaften dieser Smartwatch gehört die Herzfrequenzmessung, die mir dabei hilft, meine Herzgesundheit im Auge zu behalten und meine Trainingsintensität zu optimieren. Die Genauigkeit der Herzfrequenzmessung ist beeindruckend und liefert zuverlässige Daten während meiner Aktivitäten.Der integrierte Schrittzähler motiviert mich, meine täglichen Bewegungsziele zu erreichen, indem er meine Schritte präzise zählt und mir hilft, aktiv zu bleiben. Ebenso überwacht der Schlafmonitor meine Schlafqualität und liefert wertvolle Einblicke in meine nächtlichen Ruhephasen.Die Smartwatch bietet auch neun verschiedene Trainingsmodi, darunter Laufen, Radfahren und Yoga, um meine Workouts zu diversifizieren und meine Fortschritte zu verfolgen. Diese Vielseitigkeit ermöglicht es mir, meine Fitnessziele individuell anzupassen und meine Trainingsroutine zu optimieren.Die Benutzeroberfläche der Smartwatch ist benutzerfreundlich und intuitiv, und das Display ist klar und gut lesbar, auch bei direkter Sonneneinstrahlung. Die Batterielaufzeit ist ebenfalls beeindruckend, und ich kann die Smartwatch problemlos mehrere Tage lang nutzen, bevor sie aufgeladen werden muss.Insgesamt bin ich äußerst zufrieden mit der GRV Smartwatch. Sie bietet eine umfassende Palette an Fitness- und Gesundheitsfunktionen in einem stilvollen und benutzerfreundlichen Design. Ich kann sie jedem empfehlen, der nach einer zuverlässigen und funktionalen Smartwatch sucht, um seine Gesundheit und Fitness zu verbessern.

reviews.reviewTitle: Vielseitig, stilvoll, funktional und mit beeindruckender Akkulaufzeit
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Ich benutze die GRV Smartwatch FC1 nun schon seit einigen Wochen und sie ist wirklich ein zuverlässiger Begleiter bei meinen täglichen Aktivitäten geworden. Das moderne Design der Uhr, vor allem in der Farbvariante Green Gold, verleiht meinem Stil einen schicken Touch, und ihr geringes Gewicht sorgt den ganzen Tag über für Komfort, ohne einzuschränken. Das TFT-LCD-Farbdisplay zeigt ein lebendiges Bild und erleichtert den Zugriff auf die zahlreichen Funktionen dieser Smartwatch.Die Verbindung mit der GloryFit-App war schnell und problemlos und ermöglicht den Zugriff auf eine breite Palette von Funktionen auf dem großen Display. Mit über 100 Multi-Trainingsmodi, Herzfrequenzmessung, SpO2-Tracking und Menstruationsvorhersage deckt diese Smartwatch alle Aspekte von Gesundheit und Fitness ab. Die 9 Sportmodi, darunter Laufen, Walken und Yoga, sind auf die verschiedenen Trainingsvorlieben abgestimmt.Die Akkulaufzeit ist beeindruckend: Sie beträgt etwa 7-10 Tage bei einer kurzen Ladezeit von 2,5 Stunden. Während einige Nutzer Ungenauigkeiten bei der Schrittzählung bemängelten, empfand ich die Werte bei meinen täglichen Aktivitäten als realistisch. Auch die Schlafüberwachung wird von der Uhr gut gehandhabt und liefert wertvolle Einblicke in mein Schlafverhalten.Trotz einiger kleinerer Nachteile, die von anderen Nutzern erwähnt wurden, wie z. B. die kleine Schriftgröße für Benachrichtigungen und die etwas komplizierte Einstellfunktion für das Zifferblatt, bin ich insgesamt mit der Leistung der Uhr zufrieden, insbesondere angesichts des günstigen Preises. Insgesamt hat die GRV Smartwatch FC1 meine Erwartungen an ein preiswertes Gerät übertroffen, denn sie bietet ein elegantes Design, zuverlässige Funktionen und einen hohen Tragekomfort. Empfehlenswert!
Bello e facile da usare. Intuitivo e molto funzionale. Tra gli smartwatch economici è tra i migliori.

Los números se ven bastante grandes,la esfera tb es grande, me parece muy bonito y cómodo. Tiene pocas opciones de poner sferas. App no muy completo como otras pero tiene bastantes cosas para ver,pulsaciones,pasoshoras de sueño,ritmo cardíaco...
